widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: I am a software engineering student at the Autonomous University of Nuevo Leon and  I am about to graduate in six months. Previously, I did professional internships at the Self-Learning Language Center of the Mechanical and Electrical Engineering School. I like to learn new things. My goal is to find my way in my career.
Hello, my name is Omar. I want to learn something new every day. Formula 1 is my favorite sport to watch and basketball my favorite sport to play, and I hope to have a fantastic time here at Justia.

I'm a digital marketing/sales-driven, creative-minded individual.  I love learning new things dealing with business, sales, and digital marketing from others.  I have a passion for basically anything to deal with technology.  For example, I used my mother's eBay account as an eBay PowerSeller back in 2003.  If a computer was around, I was behind it. I am a networker like no other on certain platforms, so If I had not attempted to add you on Linkedin already, make sure to connect!

Hi! I’m Alfredo Galvan, I am 30 years old and I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila. I am a back-end developer, but I want to become a full-stack developer soon. I love to play video games, and I consider myself competitive. I love music, and I enjoy singing and playing the guitar. I’m really excited to learn new stuff from you all.

Hi everyone! My name is Jonatan Reynosa. I'm 21 years old, and I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila. I just graduated from Computer Systems Engineering, and I'm looking forward to growing as a developer. My favorite hobbies are playing video games, listening to music, and playing a few musical instruments. I'm excited to start this new journey and work with you all.

Hi! I'm Alexis Ortiz Velazquez. I consider myself a funny person who likes to work in teams. I'm currently studying systems engineering at the University of Guanajuato. I'm passionate about learning anything that seems exciting and challenging for me. I like to read and play video games with friends during my free time.
Hi, I am Angel Sanchez! I am passionate about technology and science fiction. I like to play sports, watch movies, thrillers, and series. I am also a big Final Fantasy and Uncharted video games fan.

My name's Silvia. I'm 28 years old, from Celaya, Guanajuato, but I live in Morelia. I have more than four years of experience in the IT area. I am a person who loves animals (especially dogs). I enjoy listening to music, and I also enjoy playing some instruments. I also like to draw and cook.

Hi! I am a computer systems engineer focused on test automation technologies and Java development. I consider myself a person in continuous development. I enjoy learning new things. I lift weights, play video games, and rewatch my favorite movies in my free time.
